title: Different World
lyrics:
Who we know, left untold
Beaten by a broken dream
Nothing like what it used to be
We've been chasin' our demons down an empty road
Been watching our castle turnin' into dust

Escapin' our shadows just to end up here once more

And we both know



This is not the world we had in mind

But we kept turnin'

We are stuck on answers we can't find

But we kept turnin'

And even though we might have lost our mind

The starlight reminds us of a different time

This is not the world we had in mind

But we kept turnin'



Broken smile, tired eyes

I can feel your longin' heart

Call my name, howlin' from afar



We've been fightin' our demons just to stay afloat

Been buildin' a castle just to watch it fall

Been runnin' forever just to end up here once more

And now we know



This is not the world we had in mind

But we kept turnin'

We are stuck on answers we can't find

But we kept turnin'

And even though we might have lost our mind

The starlight reminds us of a different time

This is not the world we had in mind

But we kept turnin'



Take me back

Back to the mountainside

Under the northern lights

Chasin' the stars



Take me back

Back to the mountainside

Where we were full of life

Back to the start

We both know that



This is not the world we had in mind

But we can't turn it

We are stuck on answers we can't find

But we can't turn it

And even though we might have lost our mind

The starlight reminds us of a different time

This is not the world we had in mind

But we can't turn it
